items.title: Ukraine hails 'real results' after Musk restricts Russian Starlink use
items.description: Starlink-enabled drones have been linked to a number of recent deadly attacks by Russia on Ukraine.

items.title: Watch: Punxsutawney Phil emerges for Groundhog Day
items.description: Legend has it that if Punxsutawney Phil sees its shadow there will be six more weeks of winter, if not, spring is around the corner.

items.title: 'Pay and smile' - Rome visitors face Trevi Fountain charge
items.description: Italy's capital city has introduced a â‚¬2 fee to access the viewing area of its iconic fountain, which had previously been free to visit.

items.title: 'Superhuman' teen swims hours to save family stranded off Australian coast
items.description: The 13-year-old swam 4km in rough water after his mother and siblings were swept out to sea off the coast of Western Australia.

items.title: Beijing criticises Dalai Lama Grammy win as 'manipulation'
items.description: The Buddhist spiritual leader is recognised in the audiobook category for his meditations.
